name: seti-super-compact-ui

1.9.9.name: seti-super-compact-ui
1.9.9.description: A compact UI Theme forked from seti-ui

themeColor.title: Theme Color
themeColor.description: Select a default theme color. If you don't notice a difference, you may have to reload Atom to see them.

compactView.title: Compact Mode
compactView.description: Select the level of compactness you desire.

disableAnimations.title: Disable Animations
disableAnimations.description: Select this if you want to disable animations.

fileIcons.title: Custom Icons
fileIcons.description: Disable this if you are using file-icons or another atom file icon package (or simply don't want custom icons)

displayIgnored.title: Display Ignored Files
displayIgnored.description: Enable this if you would like to not see ignored files at all (as opposed to simple muting the style)

hideTabs.title: Hide Tabs
hideTabs.description: Enable this if you prefer to rely on the sidebar for nagivation and don't want to see tabs at all.

readme:
# Seti UI Super Compact

This is the a UI Theme forked off https://github.com/jesseweed/seti-ui

This fork adds a second compact mode, "Super Compact". So now in the settings, you can now choose between "Normal", "Compact", and "Super Compact" modes.

![Screenshot](https://github.com/mdonnalley/seti-super-compact-ui/blob/master/screenshot.png?raw=true)

metadata.name: seti-super-compact-ui
metadata.description: A compact UI Theme forked from seti-ui

themeColor.title: Theme Color
themeColor.description: Select a default theme color. If you don't notice a difference, you may have to reload Atom to see them.

compactView.title: Compact Mode
compactView.description: Select the level of compactness you desire.

disableAnimations.title: Disable Animations
disableAnimations.description: Select this if you want to disable animations.

fileIcons.title: Custom Icons
fileIcons.description: Disable this if you are using file-icons or another atom file icon package (or simply don't want custom icons)

displayIgnored.title: Display Ignored Files
displayIgnored.description: Enable this if you would like to not see ignored files at all (as opposed to simple muting the style)

hideTabs.title: Hide Tabs
hideTabs.description: Enable this if you prefer to rely on the sidebar for nagivation and don't want to see tabs at all.
